txt.en: Use this panel to customize and create a Skirmish  or Instance from anywhere in Middle-earth. Members of your fellowship, or those who join after creation, will be extended an invitation to follow you.  Level: Monster level. This may be adjusted as desired. Difficulty: Increases monster strength. Size: Number of players that can enter the Skirmish. Size cannot be adjusted for Instances.  Different settings will change the amount of Skirmish or Instance Marks you acquire during play.

Use this panel to customize and create a Skirmish from anywhere in Middle-earth. Members of your fellowship, or those who join after creation, will be extended an invitation to follow you. Level: Monster level. This can be adjusted as desired. Difficulty: Increases monster strength. Size: Number of players that can enter the Skirmish.  Different settings will change the amount of Marks you acquire during play.
